Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6535 (MIC=30 µg/ml), S. saprophyticus (MIC=30 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli CCT1371 (MIC=15 µg/ml), Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 23355, Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=30 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Jellein-3 has antibacterial and antifungal activity.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Found in the hypopharyngeal glands of the worker honeybee.

Literature.Title: Jelleines a family of antimicrobial peptides from the Royal Jelly of honeybees (Apis mellifera).
Literature.Author: ntana R, Mendes MA, de Souza BM, Konno K, César LM, Malaspina O, Palma MS.

Literature.Title: Jelleines: a family of antimicrobial peptides from the royal jelly of honeybees (Apis mellifera).
